statements: DELETE FROM therapist_resources WHERE resource_name = 'Therapy Manual';
DELETE FROM resources WHERE category = 'Medical Supplies';
DELETE FROM resources WHERE category = 'Medical' AND resource_name LIKE '%Surgery%';
DELETE FROM sessions WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND resource_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
DELETE FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'video' AND resource_id IN (SELECT resource_id FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'educational');
DELETE FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
